sole purpose of this Pre-Confirmation is to set forth the financial terms of this transaction. This Pre-Confirmation does not constitute a legally binding contract, including a Confirmation as defined in the applicable ISDA Definitions. The information contained in this Pre-Confirmation may be supplemented and/or modified in case of error. You will shortly receive a Confirmation and/or other document summarising all the terms and conditions of this transaction. Although the information contained in this Pre-Confirmation is believed to be reliable, we make no representation as to the accuracy or completeness of any information contained in this Pre-Confirmation or otherwise provided by us. Citigroup is not acting and has not acted as your advisor or agent. Citigroup does not provide and has not provided accounting, tax or legal advice. Legal Disclaimer This e-mail message is sent to you by a member of Citigroup. It may contain legally privileged, confidential or proprietary information. If you are not the intended recipient, please notify the sender immediately, delete this message from your system and do not copy, transfer or disclose this message or its contents to any third party. There is no guarantee that e-mail transmissions are secure or error-free as such transmissions can be intercepted, corrupted, lost or destroyed, or can arrive late or incomplete or can contain viruses. The sender does not accept liability for any errors or omissions in the contents, or delay in receipt, of this e-mail message or its attachments which arise in the course of its transmission or receipt, and does not guarantee that the message contains no viruses. The sender reserves the right to monitor and record all e-mail messages, whether received or sent by the sender of this e-mail message. Any investment services or products offered in this message are made available, solely to market counter parties and intermediate customers (each as defined by the UK Financial Services Authority). No other person may rely on the contents of such communication nor have access to any such investment services or products. END NOTIFICATION _____ Antes de imprimir este mensaje o sus documentos anexos, aseg?rese de que es necesario. Proteger el medio ambiente est? en nuestras manos. Before printing this e-mail or attachments, be sure it is necessary.
